text: "Your Decision" is a 2009 song by Alice in Chains. It is the second single from their fourth studio album Black Gives Way to Blue and went to number 1 on the Canadian Rock charts and number 1 on the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative Songs chart. It also made number 57 in Canada. ==Track listing== CD Single (509994 58606 2 1) # "Your Decision" (radio edit) – 4:00 # "Your Decision" (album version) – 4:43 ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Acoustic rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Your Decision
